divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and I were star gazing at a friend's house, when this group of lights caught our attention. At first we thought it was a plane because all we saw at first was two white lights and a red in the center, but as it passed over us, we clearly saw it was not. A black perfect equilateral triangle. It didn't have the saw tooth pattern on the back like the B-2, it wasn't diamond shaped like the F-117, just a perfect black triangle with three bright white lights on the bottom of each point, and one less bright, slightly larger red light in the center. It emitted a sound. Though only slight, it was something of a metallic muffled hum. Also the way it moved was pretty disturbing. It didn't swoop like what an aircraft usually does. It kind of shook. Almost like balancing a magnet on top of another. It looked like whatever was keeping it up was not jet propulsion. As quickly as it passed it disappeared behind the tree line a mile off. Afterward I was excited, almost a little upset that I didn't get to meet these beings, if at all they were aliens, but a general feeling of uneasiness befell everyone. My reason is, I've never heard of a pleasant abduction by a triangular craft.
Summary: Fist UFO fly directly above my friend's house, had to be an altitude less than 600 ft. This thing was huge, and quiet. I saw the complete silloutte. Perfect triangle.
